Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ・ジベールの家
<speed:00>『年代モノの本』 読み込まれているせいか けっこう傷んでいる。 取り扱いに注意。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> 'Book of the Ages' The book is quite damaged due to extensive usage. Handle with care.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『古代カレギア紳士ジョーク集』 （古代カレギア語で書かれている）
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "A Collection of Ancient Callegean Gentlemen's Jokes" (Written in the ancient Callegean language)

Entry.JapaneseText: ぷ……お、面白いけど…… 他人に話したら、私の品性を 疑われちゃうわ……
Entry.EnglishText: Pff... Oh, it's funny, but... If I relay this joke to the others, they'll question my decency...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が書いてあるのかしら…… 今度、<Hilda>さんに 読んでもらおうかな。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what it says here... Maybe I'll ask <Hilda> to read it next time.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……読めないけど、どうせ くだらないオヤジギャグだよネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Can't read it... But it's probably just a silly old gag anyway.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、内容が気になるぜ!! 絶対、<Hilda>に読んでもらうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh dang, I really want to know! I'll definitely get <Hilda> to read it for me one day!

Entry.JapaneseText: ハックはこんなものを 研究しているのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this the "research" that Hack's been telling us about?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『引き出しの中身』 古い日記帳が何冊も 収納されている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Drawer's Contents" A number of old diary books are stored in the drawer.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『ジベールの日記帳 子供時代編 全六巻』 表紙にきちょうめんな字で タイトルが書かれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Dival's Diary Childhood Edition, Sixth Volume" The title is written on the front cover in scribbled characters.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『引き出しの中身』 ジベールの日記帳が 何冊も収納されている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Drawer's Contents" Several of Dival's diaries are stored in the drawer.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『ジベールの日記帳 子供時代編 全六巻』 けっこうマメな性格らしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Dival's Diary Childhood Edition, Sixth Volume" He seems to be a very diligent person.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『消えた楽園』 かつてクロダダク砂漠にあった 村を描いたと言われている作品。 デスガロ熱によって村が滅んだため、 その真相を知る者はいない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Paradise Disappeared" This work is said to depict a village that once existed in the Klododakh Desert. The village was destroyed by Deathgaro fever, and no one knows the truth about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『大カレギア儀』 ピンクとオレンジの輪には 磁石が仕込まれており、 カレギア王国を模した球体は 空中に浮かんでいる。 とても珍しくて高価。 横にあるのは大コンパス。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "The Great Callegean Ceremony" The pink and orange rings are filled with magnets, and the sphere, which resembles the Kingdom of Callegea, floats in the air. Very rare and expensive. Located to the side, is a large compass.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>『ミニ黒板』 上段「モクモクは煙か霧か？」 下段「男女間の友情は成立するか？」 謎めいた言葉が書いてあるが、 意味は不明。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> "Mini Blackboard". Upper row "Is the mist considered smoke or fog? Bottom row, "Is friendship between a man and a woman possible? Mysterious words are written on it, but the meanings are unknown.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえさんたち、 ここへ何しに来た？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you all doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 用がないなら、 帰るんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't have anything to do here, you should leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした？ ハックを助けに 行ってくれないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on? Aren't you going to help Hack?

Entry.JapaneseText: 災難だったな。 城の中に入るなら、 勝手に通っていいぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: That was a disaster. If you want to go inside the castle, it'd be better if you were on your own.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはお嬢さんの 来るようなところではない。
Entry.EnglishText: This is no place for a young lady.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族意識の高まり…… ……女王の処刑…… もうすぐ、波が来る……
Entry.EnglishText: The rise of racial awareness... ... Execution of the queen... Soon, the wave will...

Entry.JapaneseText: 始まった…… もう誰にも止められん……
Entry.EnglishText: It has begun... No one can stop it now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはお嬢さんが 来るようなところじゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is not the kind of place for a young lady.

Entry.JapaneseText: 嫌な予感がする…… 恐ろしい事が始まる…… だが……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't feel so good about this... Horrible things are about to happen... Even then...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの娘のような者がいるのなら 希望はあるのかもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: If people like that girl exist, maybe there's hope...

Entry.JapaneseText: 始まった…… 世の中のうねりは もう誰にも止められん……
Entry.EnglishText: It has started... No one can stop the swelling of the world now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何かが終わろうとしている。 何かが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Something is about to be completed. But what...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かが変わり始めている…… 強く……まばゆい力が、世界に 満ち始めている……
Entry.EnglishText: Something is beginning to change... A strong... dazzling force is beginning to fill the world...

Entry.JapaneseText: あの儀式以来、 城内の警備は かなり厳しくなっておる。
Entry.EnglishText: Since that ceremony, the security in the castle has become much tighter.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王は病気で伏せっていると 聞いたが、それは嘘の発表なのだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that the Queen is lying low due to illness, do you think it has to do with the ceremony?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……とにかく……今は城内には 入らん方がいい……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Anyway... You shouldn't enter the castle now...

Entry.JapaneseText: 隊長さんや……ガジュマたちは なぜ突然、ヒューマを目の仇に するようになったのかね……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did the captain... and the rest of the Gajuma suddenly turn on the Huma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰かがあおっているという話は ワシのところには来ておらん。 妙だな……
Entry.EnglishText: I've never heard of anyone stirring things up like that. That's strange...

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、世の中の変わりぶり、 こいつは普通じゃない…… あんた……何も知らないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: The way the world is changing, it's not normal by any means... You... don't know anything, don't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何かある、という目だが…… まあいい、いずれわかるだろうさ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...The look in your eyes tells me... Oh well, we'll find out soon enough...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お嬢ちゃん…… 少し雰囲気が変わったな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Young lady... Your mood has changed quite a bit...

Entry.JapaneseText: お嬢ちゃんにとっちゃあ、 ヒューマがガジュマを憎いと 思うなんてのは当たり前だったな……
Entry.EnglishText: For a girl like you, it was a given that the Huma would hate the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……理由がわかってるなら、 心配する必要もないしな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...And if you know the reasons why, you no longer have to worry about a thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマ…… ふたつの種族がある限り、 その間の争いなどなくならんよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Huma and Gajuma... As long as there are two species, there will never be any real conflict that arise between them...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族という言葉を知った時、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>だった生き物は、ヒューマと ガジュマという別物になったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: When I learned the word "race," the entities that were known as simply <Yellow>People<White> were split into two different things, Huma and Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……国のお偉いさんたちは <Yellow>ヒト<White>は皆同じだ、仲良くしろと やっきになって言い回っている……
Entry.EnglishText: ...The leaders of the land are going around saying that <Yellow>People<White> are all the same and should get along....

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、本当に同じなのか？ ヒューマはなぜガジュマに恋をしない？ なぜハーフがいない……？
Entry.EnglishText: But are they really the same? Why don't Huma fall in love with Gajuma? Why aren't there any Halfbloods...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この国は、どこへ向かおうと しているんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder where this country is headed...

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅に出ようかって 考えてるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm thinking about going on a journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: 学問をするなら、 もっと見聞を広げなきゃいけないって ジベールさんに言われてね。
Entry.EnglishText: Dival told me that if I wanted to be a scholar, I needed to broaden my horizons.

Entry.JapaneseText: くれぐれも 気をつけてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: You best do well to take care of yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちぇっ、留守番かよ…… みんな、早いところ 帰って来てくれよな。
Entry.EnglishText: Away from home, huh... Guys, I'd like ta' go back soon as well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……昼寝でもして 待ってるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'll take a nap while I wait.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d00009e>ジベールさんは いるか？
<voice:1d00009f>わしがジベールだが…… 何の用だ？
<voice:1d0000a0><Cyan>「霧の奥にある夢の続きが見たい」<White>
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A0>"<Cyan>I want to see the continuation of the dream within the mist.<White>"

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a1>ふむ…… あいつに会ったか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A1>Hmph... I see you've met him, then.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a2>ああ、 ヨッツアから聞いた……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A2>Yeah, we heard about you from Yotza.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a3>何のためにカレギア城に もぐり込むつもりだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A3>For what purpose do you intend to sneak into Callegea Castle?
<voice:1D0000A4>What's more, even the former Commander is involved... <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a5>今、王国で何かが起ころうとしている。 その真相を探るために 城内に入らなくてはならないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A5>Something is about to happen to this country. We need to gain entry into the castle in order to investigate the truth of the matter.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a7>ふむ…… だが、いくらヨッツアの紹介でも、 簡単に通してやるわけにはいかん。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A7>Hmph... Sorry, but regardless of Yotza's referral, I can't just freely divulge that kind of information.
<voice:1D0000A8>What, you sayin' you don't trust us?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000a9>まあ、そう言う事だ。 だから、証明して欲しい。 おまえさんたちがわしらの敵ではない という事を示す、誠意ってヤツをな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000A9>Well frankly, yes. So I want you to provide proof. Prove to me that you are not my enemies, and that you are sincere.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000ab>わしの部下のハックというのが、 考古学の研究をしておるのだが、 街の北東にあるメセチナ洞窟へ調査に 行ったきり、戻って来ないのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000AB>A subordinate of mine, Hack, is an archeologist. He went northeast of this city to Cave Mesechina some time ago for research, but has yet to return.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000ac>何かの事故に巻き込まれたのか、 それとも敵に捕まったのか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000AC>I want to know if he has been victim to some kind of accident, or perhaps captured by an enemy...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000ad>そのハックって人を 探しに行けばイイの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000AD>So you want us to go and look for this Hack guy?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000af>北東の洞窟だな。 行くぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000AF>A cave to the northeast. We're on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b1>このまま、おまえさんたちが逃げて、 お上にたれ込まないとは限らない。 誰でもいい、二人、ここに残ってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B1>I have no guarantee that you won't run off and inform the authorities about me. Two of you must stay behind. It doesn't matter who.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b2>じいさん、黙って聞いてりゃ、 足元見やがって!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B2>The hell, old man? You're just trying to take advantage of us, you crook!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b3>そういう相手に、おまえさんたちは 事を頼んでいるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B3>Well, you people are the ones who wish to deal with said “crook.”

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b5>よしなよ、<Tytree>！ あっちに分がある。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B5>Stop it, <Tytree>! We aren't in a position to argue.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b6>世の中を知っているようだな、 お嬢さん……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B6>I see this young woman here is a wise one.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b7>……ちっ。わかったよ。 で、誰が残るんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B7>...Tch. Fine. So who are we gonna leave behind?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000b9>オレは行く。 <Mao>も敵の能力者を 探知する上で必要だ。 残るのは……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000B9>I'm going to the cave. <Mao> should come with me since he can detect the enemy's Force. As for the rest...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0120><Unk18:48f404><Veigue>は行く。 <Unk18:48f804><Mao>は行く。 <Unk18:48fc04><Eugene>は<Unk18:48dc04> <Unk18:480005><Annie>は<Unk18:48e004> <Unk18:480405><Tytree>は<Unk18:48e404> <Unk18:480805><Hilda>は<Unk18:48e804> <White> 決定してパーティを編成する
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0120><Unk18:48f404><Veigue> is going. <Unk18:48f804><Mao> is going. <Unk18:48fc04><Eugene><Unk18:48dc04> <Unk18:480005><Annie><Unk18:48e004> <Unk18:480405><Tytree><Unk18:48e404> <Unk18:480805><Hilda><Unk18:48e804> <White> Organize your party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><Green><Unk19:28b804>は行かなければなりません。
<speed:00><scale:0140>メンバーを変更しますか？ はい いいえ
<voice:1d0000c6>ご苦労だった。 カレギア城に入る道を教えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C6>Good work. All right, I'll tell you how to enter Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c7>この家の裏口を出ると、 その先に地下道がある。 そこを抜ければ、 城に入る事ができる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C7>If you leave through the rear exit of this house, you will find an underground passage just ahead. Follow that path, and you will be able to enter the castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c8>なによ！ そんな単純な抜け道があるの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C8>Unbelievable! To think that such a simple entrance exists...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000c9>もともと城で非常事態があった時、 王族が抜け出すために、 作られた抜け道みたいだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000C9>Apparently, it was made as an escape route for the royal family in times of emergency.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000ca>使われないうちに すっかり忘れ去られたみたいだけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000CA>But it seems like after years of never using it, they forgot about it completely.
<voice:1D0000CB>It's hard to see what's right under your nose, huh...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000cc>よっしゃ、 とにかくそこを行こうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000CC>Alrighty, we have a castle to sneak into!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000cd>キミのつけてるお守り…… 蒼月石じゃないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000CD>The charm you're wearing... That's a Lapis Lazuli, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000cf>とても不思議な石さ。 満ち欠けするんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000CF>It's an incredibly mysterious stone. It wanes and waxes, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d1>ほらよく見てごらんよ。 キミの持ってるその石は もう半分以上も光に満ちている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D1>Go on, take a good look. That stone you're wearing is already about half-full with a shining light.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d3>まもなく、この石いっぱいに 光が満ちるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D3>It's going to be completely full of it before long.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d4>昔の人は欠けて満ちる月を見て、 死んでは復活する聖なるものだと 思っていたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D4>Long ago, people saw the waning and waxing of the moon and thought it of it as a sacred entity that went through a cycle of death and rebirth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d5>だから古代の人々は自分たちが死んでも 生まれ変われるようにと、 月を崇めていた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D5>Because of this, ancient societies worshiped the moon in the hopes that they, too, would be reborn after death.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d6>それで月のように満ち欠けする その石をお守りにしたんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D6>So they used stones like yours as protective charms because they wane and wax like the moon.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d7>この石に光が満ちると どうなるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D7>When the stone fills up with light, what'll happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000d8>古い言い伝えでは、 <Blue>聖なる王<White>がよみがえるって 言われてる…… ま、何なのかまではわからないけど。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1D0000D8>According to ancient legends, it is said that a <Blue>Sacred King<White> will be reborn... Well, I'm still not really sure what that's supposed to mean though.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1d0000dc>……世話になったな、ジベールさん。
<speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
